title: From Bhubaneswar
description: By road, take NH-16 to Cuttack, then NH-55 to Badamba (~65 km, 1.5–2 hours). By train, travel to Cuttack (~30 minutes), then bus/taxi to Badamba (~1 hour).

title: From Cuttack
description: Take NH-55 via Athagarh to Badamba (~40 km, ~1 hour by car/bus). Alternatively, take a train to Badabandha Road Station, then a taxi (~15 km).

title: By Air
description: Fly to Biju Patnaik International Airport in Bhubaneswar (~65 km), then take a taxi or bus to Badamba (~1.5 hours).

title: By Train
description: Reach Badabandha Road Station (~15 km) or Cuttack Station (~40 km), then take a taxi or auto-rickshaw to Badamba.

title: By Road
description: OSRTC buses from Bhubaneswar’s Baramunda Bus Stand or Cuttack’s Badambadi Bus Stand. Taxis and auto-rickshaws are also available.

title: In Badamba
description: Budget guesthouses (~₹500–₹1,000/night) and homestays available. Contact Badamba NAC for bookings, especially during festivals.

title: In Cuttack
description: Hotels like Seetal (~₹2,000–₹3,500/night) and Ambica Residency (~₹1,000–₹2,000/night) offer comfortable stays, ~40 km away.

title: In Bhubaneswar
description: Options include Swosti Premium (~₹4,000–₹6,000/night) and Pushpak (~₹1,200–₹2,500/night), ~65 km from Badamba.

title: Badamba Map
description: Use Google Maps for navigation: https://maps.app.goo.gl/7z8z5z6z5z6z5z6z5. Shows Badamba, NH-55, and landmarks like Singhanath Temple.
